name: get_home_page_overview
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool spotify_scraper.
Tool description: An all-in-one scraper for scraping everything on Spotify, and a highly available download solution for tracks, lyrics and episode previews.
API description: This endpoint fetches trending information displayed on the Spotify home page as an incognito visitor.

region.description: Region code (ISO 3166 alpha-2) for localized results. Defaults to `None`, which will fallback to `US` if unsupported.
